summary: This is an email exchange from December 29, 2021, where one person congratulates another on the Ghislaine Maxwell verdict. The sender acknowledges the hard work and persistence of the recipient's team in achieving justice.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a verdict in a criminal case. The email congratulates the recipient on the news of her verdict.

events.title: Maxwell Verdict Reaction
events.description: An email is sent congratulating the recipient on hearing the news of the Ghislaine Maxwell verdict, acknowledging the hard work that led to justice being served.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 29, 2021, reacting to the Ghislaine Maxwell verdict.
The sender congratulates the recipient, implying the recipient was part of the team that worked on the Maxwell case.
The email characterizes the verdict as 'justice finally being served' for the hard work and persistence of the team.
